author: Cristina Marcos
title: Asian-American lawmaker warns of fear of racism over coronavirus stigma
description: Rep. Grace Meng (D-N.Y.) on Monday urged fellow lawmakers to sign onto her resolution condemning anti-Asian rhetoric, stating that the racism against Asian Americans due to stigma over the coronavirus is leading people to...
